de.codecrafters.tableview

Class TableView<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • de.codecrafters.tableview.TableView<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SortableTableView

    public class TableView<T>
extends LinearLayout
    A view that is able to display data as a table. For bringing the data to the view the TableDataAdapter can be used. For formatting the table headers the TableHeaderAdapter can be used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new TableView with the given context.

      • setSwipeToRefreshListener

        public void setSwipeToRefreshListener(SwipeToRefreshListener listener)
        Sets the SwipeToRefreshListener for this table view. If there is already a SwipeToRefreshListener set it will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        listener - The SwipeToRefreshListener that is called when the user triggers the refresh action.

      • setHeaderBackground

                                int resId)
        Sets the given resource as background of the table header.
        Parameters:
        resId - The if of the resource tht shall be set as background of the table header.

      • setHeaderBackgroundColor

        public void setHeaderBackgroundColor(int color)
        Sets the given color as background of the table header.
        Parameters:
        color - The color that shall be set as background of the table header.

      • setHeaderElevation

        public void setHeaderElevation(int elevation)
        Sets the elevation level of the header view. If you are not able to see the elevation shadow you should set a background(-color) to the header.
        Parameters:
        elevation - The elevation that shall be set to the table header.

public void setDataRowColorizer(TableDataRowColorizer<? super T> colorizer)

        Sets the given TableDataRowColorizer that will be used to define the background color for every table data row.
        Parameters:
        colorizer - The TableDataRowColorizer that shall be used.

      • addDataClickListener

        public void addDataClickListener(TableDataClickListener<T> listener)
        Adds a TableDataClickListener to this table. This listener gets notified every time the user clicks a certain data item.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener that should be added as click listener.

      • addDataLongClickListener

        public void addDataLongClickListener(TableDataLongClickListener<T> listener)
        Adds a TableDataLongClickListener to this table. This listener gets notified every time the user clicks long on a certain data item.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener that should be added as long click listener.
